system.description:
An item of great wizardly power, this staff may be used as a weapon in melee, and may evoke five different magical effects.

  • Arcane magic: Usable by arcane spell casters only.

  • Melee: Expending one charge, inflicts 2d6 damage on a successful hit.

  • Cone of cold: Conjures a cone of freezing energy, 60’ long and 30’ wide at the far end. Creatures caught in the cone suffer [[/r 8d6]] damage (save versus spells for half damage).

  • Spells: Can cast: @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.spells.Item.kpC4u6vrjJ1RnikN]{continual light}, @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.spells.Item.ZrYh8AabsTCnqRjb]{fire ball} ([[/r 8d6]] damage), @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.spells.Item.anWBslOOlZtV47ut]{lightning bolt} ([[/r 8d6]] damage), @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.spells.Item.g7CsvZa6bNbXiCAJ]{telekinesis} (up to 2,400 coins of weight).
